Title: Dvoynaya familiya
Actors: Oleg Shtefanko, Oksana Bazilevich, Sergey Barkovskiy, Slava Korobitsin
Plot: A happy new father learns that's he is not the natural father of his son; despite this he decides to raise the child as his own. His wife leaves him after several years of quiet acrimony for the boy's natural father.
